text: 4 types of Tetanus: 1 Generalized tetanus: Most common & severe form afects al skeletal muscles 2 Localtetanus: Manifests with muscle spasms at or near the infected wound 3 Cephalic tetanus: Affects one or more muscles in face in 1 or 2 days after a head injury or ear infection. Lockjaw occur that can easily. progress to generalized tetanus. 4 Neonataltetanus: s simiar to generalized tetanus except that it afects a neonate
